_____________________________________________________________________________________

Everything you need to play Epoch/Overpoch Online!
Use this repack for any server.

All DLC Unlocked!

###################################
#### Arma 1.44 Full Installer #####
###################################


1. Install

2. Run desktop shortcut to connect to Arma 3 Epoch Server OR Arma 3 Mixed Server
	- Use "DankDayZ Epoch Connect" Shortcut to join our EPOCH server
	- Use "DankDayZ Arma Connect" Shortcut to join our Normal Arma 3 TDM/Mixed server
	- Use "Arma 3 Epoch" Shortcut Start Arma 3 with EPOCH enabled
	- Use "Arma 3" Shortcut to Start Arma 3 Singleplayer and Multiplayer


If you experience a freeze when you try to connect to any multiplayer servers.

- Disable Windows Error Reporting
- Run the "Permissions_Fix.bat" in your Arma 3 Directory (As Admin)

If that didn't work you can unlock full admin

- Google "unlock full admin win7/8"
- Reinstall with your full admin account!


##################################
########  Included Mods  #########
##################################

Epoch (0.3.0.3)
Overpoch (@mas 1.8 / @mas Vehicles 1.0)
